info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 15 at 12:07AM EDT until June 15 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh PA
info.description:
FFWPBZ
The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Ohio County in northern West Virginia...
* Until 300 AM EDT.
* At 1207 AM EDT, emergency management reported extensive flash flooding across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected.
FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Wheeling, Triadelphia, Valley Grove, WV. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wheeling, Warwood, Bethlehem, Triadelphia, Valley Grove, Clinton and Elm Grove.
info.instruction:
If you are in the path of flooding, move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WHEELING, TRIADELPHIA, VALLEY GROVE, WV
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 3:00 AM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 3:00 AM EDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WHEELING, TRIADELPHIA, VALLEY GROVE, WV
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:00 AM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:00 AM EDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
